DOC.brief_summary: This study compare follow immunosuppressive regimen recipient kidney transplantation : A ) everolimus , cyclosporine steroid give once-a-day ; B ) everolimus cyclosporine give twice day steroid withdrawal ; C ) everolimus , cyclosporine give twice day continuous steroid . The purpose study evaluate regimens A B comparison control group ( group C ) efficacy , use main endpoint treatment failure rate , composite endpoint include death , graft loss , BPAR lose follow-up randomization Month 12 .
